rows.label: qst100401_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Hongeee~♪ Hogehoge~♪

rows.label: qst100401_msg0002
rows.name:
Are you perhaps thinking
that Falala is showing off
my monster impressions, mo?

rows.label: qst100401_msg0003
rows.name:
It's fine, mo... Everyone
says that, mo... Falala
is just Falala, mo...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0004
rows.name:
Falala's dream is to become a
wonderful singer and be famous, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0005
rows.name:
So that rumors of Falala will
spread throughout Alst...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0006
rows.name:
And if they reach my child's ears,
he won't feel lonely, mo...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0007
rows.name:
Actually, my son Solala went out
fishing and hasn't come back, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm sure he's alive
somewhere... I want to go
look for him right away...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0009
rows.name:
But Falala gets seasick, so I
can't go looking for him, mo...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0010
rows.name:
I started singing in the hope that
at least my name would reach him...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0011
rows.name:
But as you've heard, Falala
is a terrible singer, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0012
rows.name:
At this rate, I'll become
famous for my good monster
impressions, mo...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0013
rows.name:
Will you help Falala become
a better singer, mo?

rows.label: qst100401_msg0014
rows.name: Wow... I'm so happy, mo!

rows.label: qst100401_msg0015
rows.name:
A customer told me there's a medicine
that gives you a beautiful singing
voice just by drinking it, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0016
rows.name:
I believe it's called...
Utamakunarurun, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0017
rows.name:
The only way to get that medicine is to
gather the ingredients and make it,
mo... Could I ask you to do that, mo?

rows.label: qst100401_msg0018
rows.name:
Such a cheerful reply... It
reminds me of Solala, mo...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0019
rows.name:
To make the medicine, you need
to boil Cranberrin Bells and
Panda Pansies from Gula, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0020
rows.name:
When you have the ingredients,
you can borrow the kitchen
in the dining hall, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0021
rows.name:
I hear that the perfect blend
when making it determines the
quality of the medicine, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0022
rows.name: I'm praying for your success, mo...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0101
rows.name:
For the medicine, you need to
gather Cranberrin Bells and
Panda Pansies from Gula...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0102
rows.name:
If you boil them together with
the perfect blend, you should be
able to make the medicine, mo.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0103
rows.name:
When you make it, you can borrow the
kitchen in the dining hall, mo.
